title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view in the background refilters. This refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not immediately upon manipulating the working set. Additionally, canceling the removal should cancel all changes made to the working sets.
OB: When a working set is deleted, the package view in the background refilters.
EB: The package view should only refilter when the working set selection dialog is closed, not immediately upon manipulating the working set. Also, canceling the removal should revert any changes made to the working sets.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered. 2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first one.
